name: Super Line Zen
description:
Super Line Zen - One of the most addictive games of 2015, totally in HD and amazing 3D visual effects.

Are you ready for this challenge? You needs to keep the blue ball away from the red objects in an amazing endless game with over 50 different levels. Be aware, the green objects will help you on your way.

Includes:

* Totally Free game. Easy to learn and difficult to put down.

* GameCenter: Post your score and challenge your friends in one of the most addictive games of 2015.

* Endless HD and 3D Animations: Play forever and try to beat your friend’s scores in over 50 exciting levels.
* Invite your friends on Facebook or Twitter to download and play Super Line Zen.


How to play:

Playing Super Line Zen is simple. Touch the screen slightly to move the ball slowly to the left or right side, keep the screen pressed to move the ball continuously to the left or right. You can use the green objects to avoid to touch the red objects. If the blue ball touches any red object, the game will be over. Try to get the best score and challenge your friends on GameCenter.
